translations: int.瞧，看哪（表示惊讶或用以引起注意）

phrs.translation: 本机振荡器, 林晓峰, 吊上吊下, 本振
卢巧音, 巧音, 爱到不能
卢志明, 卢建邦, 书籍设计
小猪罗志祥, 罗志祥的英文名, 显示

sentences.sentence: I believed thou wert dead these seven years, and lo, here thou art alive!
sentences.translation: 我以为这七年您已经死了，看哪，您还活着！

sentences.sentence: He muttered to himself, "Lo, the poor thing's madness is up with the time!"
sentences.translation: 他自言自语地嘟囔着：“瞧，这可怜的家伙的疯癫已经随着时间过去了！”

sentences.sentence: When he had finished, Miles said to himself, "Lo, what an imagination he hath!"
sentences.translation: 他讲完后，迈尔斯自言自语道：“瞧，他的想象力多丰富啊！”
